/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by a variety of buildings, their architecture hinting at the urban landscape of Beijing. Power lines crisscross above, a common sight in many cities, while trees line the sidewalk, adding a touch of green to the urban scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky.
